context: is the game a download or a disk, and does it need internet to play the game.
response: The game is a disk. If you play the story mode only then you don't need the internet access. If you want to play online with other players( very cool) the you need internet access.

context: If upgrading from a 250GB HDD to 320 GB HDD, is there a way to transfer all of my info from the first to the second so I won't have to swap them out?
response: Yes, you need a transfer cable. Put one of the drives on the cable and plug into USB. The Xbox should recognize it and offer to transfer the data for you. Once complete, make sure the new drive is installed in the HDD slot of the Xbox.

context: So if you have an Xbox One AND an Xbox 360, you need two seperate cards?
response: No, the card counts towards your profile and not the specific console, so one card is all you need
